links.to_node: Ann may continue to seek help from me for studying for the MCAT, leading to more interactions and potential misunderstandings about the nature of our relationship.
My decision to help Ann may lead to rumors or misunderstandings among our colleagues or friends about the nature of our relationship, potentially causing discomfort or tension in our social circles.
There is a possibility that Ann may develop romantic feelings towards me due to my continued assistance, leading to potential complications and misunderstandings in our interactions.
My decision to help Ann may lead to increased time and emotional investment in her situation, potentially impacting my own personal and professional responsibilities.
There is a possibility that my continued assistance to Ann may lead to her relying on me for emotional support beyond studying, potentially impacting my own emotional well-being and boundaries.
My decision to help Ann may lead to her feeling more pressure to succeed in the MCAT, potentially impacting her mental and emotional well-being.

There is a possibility that my continued assistance to Ann may lead to misunderstandings or miscommunications due to cultural differences, potentially causing further tension or discomfort in our interactions.
